name: Why is 6 afraid of 7: 9's revenge
description:
7 ate 9 again. 9 doesn't want to be eaten by 7. There is a way to stop this.

You are 9 in this game.

Game objective: shoot all the 7. There are 100 of them.

Keyboard control: (can't play without keyboard)

w: jump

a/d: go left/right

s: go down a platform

space: shoot bullet

enter: start the game

r: go back to the menu (you can't pause in this game)

If the control doesn't work, you may click on the gaming screen to solve it.

This is my first game upload on itch.io. Hope you enjoy it!

If you can finish this game under 85 seconds. You are really good!
